context: In 2015, Zebra Technologies had recently completed the major acquisition of Motorola Solutions' Enterprise business in 2014, significantly expanding its product portfolio into mobile computers, barcode scanners, and RFID readers. This acquisition transformed Zebra from primarily a printer company to a comprehensive enterprise mobility solutions provider.
